title: Learner-Centered Language Education Design in Massive Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational language learning knowledge and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning for in-service professionals using digital devices, with a summative assessment-focused evaluation system

learning_goals: Learners can write language project proposals using online collaboration tools.
Learners can improve language materials by incorporating peer feedback through a digital platform at least twice.
Learners can engage in discussions utilizing at least ten specialized language terms on online discussion boards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
